homepage.title: Sheng Wen (Mos) Cheng
content: 3D Generalist and Motion Designer based in Taiwan.
Offering professional design services for digital arts and product motion design, catering to companies and brands.

para1.title: Crafting Perfection
content: As a diverse motion designer, I am eager to explore the possibilities of animation, focusing on creating stunning vision throught keen insights and pushing team's ideas to practice.
Take on challenges in any project and develop workflows or pipelines to solve problems.

para2.title: Every Second Counts
content: Worked at JL Design and Mixcode as Motion Designer during 2018 to 2023, we made several brilliant achievement including awarded TV packages, channel branding and commercials, every second of our work was crafted with precision and creativity.

experience.title: Freelance 3D Generalist / Motion Designer
detail: Specialize in crafting product animations and advertisements, consistently delivering impactful visuals across diverse industries, from concept to final rendering.
Proficient in creating custom tools and interactive web applications. Released a set of tools designed to enhance efficiency for creators under a nickname 'SlothFellas'.

experience.title: Motion Designer
detail: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to produce 3D artwork and motion design for advertisement, contributing to several award-winning projects.
Played a crucial role in a project focused on procedural NFT generation. crafting 3D character models and 2D motion by developing custom Cinema 4D and After Effects plug-ins.

experience.title: Intern, Motion Designer
detail: Executing projects from concept to visual execution. Developed a deep understanding of the entire creative process, translating concepts into visually stunning visuals.
Driving projects with superb insight and cutting-edge techniques. Elevating visual quality while ensuring high efficiency.
